Oh come on I think they're point is to be a group of
watchers that get very mad.  If they were God then
they would have known the Maximals and Preds were
coming to Earth and stoped them before they got there,
Tigerhawk WOULDN'T have nearly destroyed the first
Megatrons spark, Turantulas wouldn't have waisted all
that time trying to destroy them,  and that explosion
WOULD DEFINATLY not have destroyed that weapon of
theirs.  I think we should have a new race enter and
beat the crap out of them, or at least fight them to a
stand still.  This new race should be obsessed with
altering time for the better when they can't stand for
anything to alter it.

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> The whole point of the Vok is that they play god.
> This is like a 
> combat between gods and normal peoples... That's the
> whole point I 
> mean...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > WHAT THEY NEED IS ANOTHER RACE THAT CAN STAND UP
> TO
> > THEM!  I HATE SEEING THEM PLAY GOD!  I'VE BEEN
> SAYING
> > THIS FOREVER, BUT NOBODY LISTENS TO ME!  OH AND NO
> I
> > DON'T THINK ANOTHER FACTION OF VOK WOULD DO
> BECAUSE
> > VOK WOULD STILL SEEM LIKE GODS AND IT WOULD JUST
> BE A
> > HUGE CLASH OF THE TITANS RATHER THAN CLASH OF THE
> > ALIEN RACES THAT ARE CAPABLE OF BLOWING UP OUR
> PLANET
> > IN A WHIM!  Oh and I propose we call the new race
> the
> > Crayaks after Ellimst's mortal enemy Crayak from
> the
> > "Animorphs" series.
> >
